summary: This document is an email from August 13, 2019, discussing a reporter's story about an unregistered ambulance operating from Jeffrey Epstein's compound in the US Virgin Islands. The email notes the local government is investigating and speculates about potential customs/government assistance for importing the ambulance. It also mentions drone footage showing raids on the compound from the previous day.

events.title: Raids on Epstein's USVI Compound
events.description: Drone footage shows law enforcement raids taking place at Jeffrey Epstein's compound in the US Virgin Islands.

keyFacts: A reporter was investigating an unregistered ambulance operating from Epstein's US Virgin Islands compound.
The local USVI government confirmed they were conducting their own investigation into the ambulance.
The email speculates that importing the ambulance to the island would have required assistance from customs or other government entities.
Drone footage linked in the email showed law enforcement raids on the compound occurring on August 12, 2019.
